hh3cDldp.name: hh3cDldp

revisions.description: The initial version of this MIB module.

hh3cDldp.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085

EnabledStatus.name: EnabledStatus
EnabledStatus.description: The current state of the Ethernet port. This object has two defined values: - 'enabled', which indicates that the Ethernet port enables DLDP. - 'disabled', which indicates that the Ethernet port does not enable DLDP.

DLDPStatus.name: DLDPStatus
DLDPStatus.description: Operating state of DLDP on the port. This object has six defined values: - 'initial', which indicates that the Ethernet port does not enable DLDP. This status does not appear in the 'hh3cDLDPPortDLDPState' object (below) because the port which is not enabled DLDP does not appear in 'hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable', it appears in 'hh3cDLDPPortStateTable'. - 'inactive', which indicates that the Ethernet port enables DLDP and the link status of the port is down. - 'active', which indicates that the Ethernet port enables DLDP and the link status of the port is up. - 'advertisement', which indicates that all neighbors of the port are bidirectional communication. - 'probe', which indicates that the port sends PDU to detect the communication mode between it and it's neighbors. - 'disable', which indicates that an unidirectional communication between the port and it's neighbor. When the user get or walk the 'hh3cDLDPPortDLDPState' objects (below) these status will output.

DLDPNeighborStatus.name: DLDPNeighborStatus
DLDPNeighborStatus.description: The current state of the neighbor of a port. This object has three defined values: - 'unidirection', which indicates an unidirectional communication between the port and it's neighbor. - 'bidirection', which indicates a bidirectional communication between the port and it's neighbor. - 'unknown', which indicates that the port does not know the communication mode between it and it's neighbor. When the user get or walk the 'hh3cDLDPNeighborState' objects (below) these status will output.

hh3cDLDPWorkMode.name: hh3cDLDPWorkMode
hh3cDLDPWorkMode.description: The work mode of DLDP. Normal mode means DLDP does not detect neighbor on its own initiative when all neighbors aged. Enhance mode means DLDP detects neighbor on its own initiative when all neighbors aged.

hh3cDLDPSystemEnable.name: hh3cDLDPSystemEnable
hh3cDLDPSystemEnable.description: DLDP enable or disable systematically. This node only supports set operation. If setting it to true, all the fiber ports will enable DLDP and the agent automatically creates new rows for each port in hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable. If setting it to false, all the fiber ports will disable DLDP and the agent automatically destroy the corresponding rows in hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable.

hh3cDLDPSystemReset.name: hh3cDLDPSystemReset
hh3cDLDPSystemReset.description: DLDP reset systematically. This node only supports set operation. If the value of hh3cDLDPSystemReset is true, and the current state is disable, it will change to inactive while the port is down or active while the port is up. If hh3cDLDPPortDLDPState is not disable, it does not change.

hh3cDLDPInterval.name: hh3cDLDPInterval
hh3cDLDPInterval.description: The interval of sending an advertisement PDU. unit : second

hh3cDLDPAuthenticationPassword.name: hh3cDLDPAuthenticationPassword
hh3cDLDPAuthenticationPassword.description: This is the password for authentication. If the value of hh3cDLDPAuthenticationMode is null, the user cannot set this node. If the value of hh3cDLDPAuthenticationMode is simple or MD5, the user must set this node with a string. When the user gets or walks this node, it displays a cipher password if hh3cDLDPAuthenticationMode is MD5 or simple or a zero-length string if hh3cDLDPAuthenticationMode is null.

hh3cDLDPUnidirectionalShutdown.name: hh3cDLDPUnidirectionalShutdown
hh3cDLDPUnidirectionalShutdown.description: The mode of unidirectional shutdown. It indicates the shutdown mode when a unidirectional link happened. Auto mode means the port will be shut down automatically when DLDP detects unidirectional link. Manual mode means the port needs to be shut down by the administrator manually when DLDP detects unidirectional link.

hh3cDLDPPortStateTable.name: hh3cDLDPPortStateTable
hh3cDLDPPortStateTable.description: The table of the Ethernet ports of a LAN switch.

hh3cDLDPPortState.name: hh3cDLDPPortState
hh3cDLDPPortState.description: State of a port. If setting it to enabled, the port will enable DLDP and a new row will be added in hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable for this port. If setting it to disabled, the port will disable DLDP and the corresponding row will be destroyed in hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable.

hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable.name: hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable
hh3cDLDPPortDLDPTable.description: Table of a LAN switch's ports, which enable DLDP.

hh3cDLDPPortDLDPEntry.name: hh3cDLDPPortDLDPEntry
hh3cDLDPPortDLDPEntry.description: The information of a port, which enable DLDP.

hh3cDLDPPortDLDPState.name: hh3cDLDPPortDLDPState
hh3cDLDPPortDLDPState.description: Operating state of DLDP on the port. It is relational with hh3cDLDPPortState and hh3cDLDPLinkState.

hh3cDLDPLinkState.name: hh3cDLDPLinkState
hh3cDLDPLinkState.description: The link state of the port.

hh3cDLDPPortDLDPReset.name: hh3cDLDPPortDLDPReset
hh3cDLDPPortDLDPReset.description: DLDP reset systematically. This node only supports set operation. If the value of hh3cDLDPPortDLDPReset is true, and the current state is disable, it will change to inactive while the port is down or active while the port is up.

hh3cDLDPNeighborBridgeMac.name: hh3cDLDPNeighborBridgeMac
hh3cDLDPNeighborBridgeMac.description: The bridge MAC address of a neighbor.

hh3cDLDPNeighborPortIndex.name: hh3cDLDPNeighborPortIndex
hh3cDLDPNeighborPortIndex.description: The port index of a neighbor.

hh3cDLDPNeighborAgingTime.name: hh3cDLDPNeighborAgingTime
hh3cDLDPNeighborAgingTime.description: The aging time of a neighbor. unit: second.

hh3cDLDPUnidirectionalPort.name: hh3cDLDPUnidirectionalPort
hh3cDLDPUnidirectionalPort.description: It will send a SNMP trap when the state of a port has changed to unidirectional-link.
